name: pagedjs-obsidian
description: Plugin Obsidian avec serveur HTTP et rechargement automatique des fichiers .md

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
